abstract: Illinois State Senate passes bill decriminalizing small amounts of marijuana, making possession of up to 15 grams a civil law violation without jail time; bill is awaiting signature of Republican Gov Bruce Rauner.
lead_paragraph: The bill makes possession of up to 15 grams of marijuana a civil law violation punishable by a $125 fine.

headline.main: Illinois: Bill Advances Easing Marijuana Rules
headline.print_headline: Midwest; Illinois: Bill Advances Easing Marijuana Rules

snippet: The bill makes possession of up to 15 grams of marijuana a civil law violation punishable by a $125 fine.
